CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 18, 1953, pg.13 reads: "Chit-Chatting - Making a pretty picture for the audience are Margaret French, Ann Butler, Doris Garret, Ida Mae Mauney, Jean Curtis and Florence Holmes, during the gala evening Friday at A. Leo Weil School. They modeled the lovely cotton outfits at the Links show, starring "Miss Spirit of Cotton, 1953," - Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, left to right; Margaret French, Ann Butler, Doris Garret, Ida Mae Mauney, Jean Curtis, and Florence Holmes wearing dark satin dress with light colored collar, and gloves, holding dark handbag, gathered around glass table with vase and flowers, on stage of A. Leo Weil school for Cotton on Parade fashion show
